welcome_message_title: Welcome to Iguala de la Independencia
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Iguala de la Independencia, where the vibrant culture and rich history are sure to capture your heart. Known for its beautiful silverwork and lively festivals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
